data.text: @katiecouric @rtraister @tribelaw @Harvard Can we also not “put aside” voter suppression and gerrymandering? Would love to see more in-depth coverage of these topics all around.

@katiecouric @rtraister @tribelaw @Harvard Would love to see more perspective from folks in red states, or in the GOP.  I still feel like we’re in the “liberal bubble” of all agreeing with each other and shared outrage.
@katiecouric And thanks to you and many, many others, International #DayOfTheGirl
@katiecouric @rtraister @tribelaw @Harvard @katiecouric listened to it this morning - fabulous and energizing episode. Woke me up out of the blue funk I’ve been in for days!
